title: ‘Absolutely asinine’: Tom Brady, Rob Gronkowski blast voters over Bill Belichick Hall of Fame snub
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "If he's not a first-ballot Hall of Famer then there's really no coach that should ever be a first-ballot Hall of Famer" Bill Belichick during his final press conference with the Patriots.

AP Photo/Steven Senne, File The Pro Football Hall of Fame voting committee’s reported decision not to elect Bill Belichick during his first time being eligible on the ballot has been a head-scratcher for many.
Count Tom Brady among those who are puzzled by the fact that Belichick did not get in this year.

title: Amtrak train with over 100 passengers derails in Northfield
author: Samantha Genzer
bullets: Local News No injuries were reported after a passenger car slipped off the tracks near the Vermont line, officials said.
An Amtrak train derails in Northfield.
Friends of Northfield Police Department An Amtrak train carrying more than 100 passengers derailed in Northfield Tuesday afternoon, though no injuries were reported, Amtrak said.
